wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Foley (19 July 1778 – 11 January 1822) was the eldest son of Hon. Andrew Foley.  He lived near Newent, Gloucestershire.He represented Droitwich from 1805 to 1807; then Herefordshire in Parliament from 1807 until 1818; and then Droitwich again from 1819 until his death.  He died unmarried.

response: ** Thomas Foley, British politician (d. 1822)
